title: Simulation-Based Medical Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Patient-doctor communication simulation training for current practitioners, focusing on medical scenario recreation for patients with language disorders

learning_goals: Learners can execute effective communication strategies with language-disordered patients with over 90% accuracy.
Demonstrate adherence to patient safety protocols and handle emergency situations with a score of 85 or above (out of 100) in simulation-based assessments
Analyze communication errors through reflective practice at level 4 or higher in team-based simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
